Promotions and Offers of Credit Cards for Online Shopping
Extra Credit Card Rewards
In addition to the regular credit card rewards such as cash rebate, air miles or reward points, some banks may offer special promotions or limited time offers for online shopping from time to time. Therefore, it's key to do your own research next time when you want to do online shopping. For example:
HSBC is offering a year-round promotion of "Red Hot Online and Overseas Spending Rewards" that gives you up to 2.4% RewardCash rebate & to up an extra 2% RewardCash rebate for overseas spending with HSBC Premier Mastercard.
Standard Chartered Bank is offering a 15% off year-round discount when shopping with Zalora at minimum spending of HK$400.
Citibank is offering a 5% discount when shopping online with Pricerite.
Hang Seng Bank is having different special promotions with various online outlets such as mydress.com, Reebonz, Neigbuy.com etc.
Limited-Time Offers
Besides the above year-round promotions, some banks also offer limited-time offers from time to time. For instance, with Hang Seng Credit Card, in addition to the regular 1.2% Cash Dollars rebate throughout the year, you can now earn a top-up offer with up to 6% Cash Dollars rebate when accumulated the designated amount of spending in dining, travel and online shopping, offer until June 30, 2020.
HSBC also offers limited-time offers with different online merchants. For example, you can now enjoy up to 15% discount on Business Class tickets purchase on Korean Air website, and an 8% discount upon spending HK$600 on Japan, Korea and Taiwan activities or products on KLOOK.

Frequently Asked Questions
Can you buy online with a credit card?
Most credit card providers offer special discounts for online/overseas spending. The rewards can be in the form of air miles, cash rebate or reward points. Some credit card providers also have promotion program and limited-time offer for particular online merchants.
Can you shop online without a credit card?
Yes you can! Many online merchants offer various payment methods including credit card, online or mobile payment platforms. However, you will be eligible for different discount offers when shopping online with your credit cards.
Which bank is best for online shopping?
There is no one-size-fits-all answer as different banks have different online offerings and promotional programs with different online merchants.
Is it safe to pay with a credit card online?
No one can guarantee safety when paying online. However, it is safer to shop online using a credit card rather than a debit card. It is because credit cards can be locked or canceled easily even if you lost your cards. Also, it’s the responsibility of the bank to hand and avoid the fraud for you.
How can I protect my credit card online?
There are multiple ways you can protect your credit card online. First, keep your account number private your information current. It is a good idea to sign up for fraud alerts using your cell phone number or email address, so make sure your banks have your correct and up-to-date information. When shopping online, go to the sites with https in their web addresses. Also, secure your devices and networks such as equipping your computer with a firewall or installing security software.
